org.modelio.api.modelio

Class Modelio

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.api.modelio.Modelio

  • public abstract class Modelio
extends Object
    This class a the class that represents the modelio application.

    It is a singleton. It can be accessed by Modelio.getInstance() method.

      • getService

        public abstract <I> I getService(Class<I> serviceInterface)
        Get the service implementing the given interface.

        Returns null if no such service is registered.

        Parameters:
        serviceInterface - the service interface.
        Returns:
        the registered service.

      • registerService

        public abstract <I> void registerService(Class<I> serviceInterface,
                       I service)
        Register a Modelio service.

        A same service may be registered for many interfaces but only one service may be registered for an interface.

        Once a service has been registered, it cannot be removed.

        Parameters:
        serviceInterface - the implemented service interface.
        service - the service implementation.
